Articles.Content:
Hello! My name is Andreas and im from Denmark. I would very much like to know if there are some danish players on the forum. The reason being is that I am very interested in how popular this lovely game is in Denmark.

I thought about writing this in danish but didnt do it cause then the admins could mabye not have read it and I could have posted alot of jibberish.

Hope you reply!

-Andreas
The International forum would be better for this. I even created a thread for Danish players (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24767-Danske-spillere), so I am Danish.
